author: Staff Reporter
text:
In view of Kaanum Pongal , Tamil Nadu State Transport Corporation will be operating special buses across Vellore on Sunday.

Twenty five buses will be operated from Vellore Old Bus Stand to Amirthi and 50 buses will ply from New Bus Stand to Sripuram, while three will ply to Vandalur.

To Cherapet

From Arcot bus stand, 10 buses will be operated to Ottaneri, while 25 buses will be operated from Arcot to Cherapet, officials said.
title: Special buses to be operated across Vellore
